start.hello:
👋 Welcome to Xminit 
Every link works. Even if it has no RSS. 
 I will monitor it and deliver the latest articles and research on time summarized and reliable.
help.text:
Don’t worry, I’m here to help you. 
 Here’s what you can do with me: 
  • /add → Add a new source 
  • /list → See all your sources 
  • /remove → Remove a source 
  • /lang → Change language 
 ❓ Common issues 
  • Nothing new? → The source may not have updated yet 
  • Source not working? → It may not have RSS, but I’ll still try to monitor it 
  • Wrong language? → Use /lang to switch 
 Still stuck? You’re not alone. 
 📧 Email us: support@xminit.com
